title: Chapter 2374 - Chapter 2374: Seeing The End Of The Plot And Seeing The End Of The Hand (3)
body:
Chapter 2374 - Chapter 2374: Seeing The End Of The Plot And Seeing The End Of The Hand (3)

Chapter 2374: Seeing the End of the Plot and Seeing the End of the Hand (3)

Translator: Nyoi-Bo Studio Editor: Nyoi-Bo Studio

However, just as he was about to commit suicide in humiliation, Wei Feng suddenly made a move.

“Hehehe…”

The old man in black stood up abruptly with his broadsword as he let out a miserable and terrifying cackle.

He suddenly looked up. His face was green and coupled with his fangs, he looked as ferocious as a crazy beast.

“Kill them!”

“Kill them all!”

“As long as they all die, I will still be me… Secret, it’s still a secret…”

Wei Feng pulled out the Yama’s Banquet from the ground.

The dark green broadsword emitted a faint light. The dragon scale patterns on the blade were activated and lit up with a blood red glow.

“Kill them all!”

Wei Feng raised his head and roared. The surging and illusory killing intent condensed and turned into a wave of blood-red anger.

This aura pierced through the sky.

It broke through the giant stone dome at the entrance of the Ran Ming ruins, blasted through the abyss of the Black Water Stream that had a depth of thousands of feet, repelled the black fog, and finally broke through the sky of the Four Symbols Secret Realm.

“Boom!”

Blood light appeared.

All the trial-takers, trial officials, and stowaways at the Four Symbols Secret Realm saw this.

“A phenomenon had just descended from the sky. There must be a treasure!” Just as someone started to have thoughts of greed, he heard a furious voice from the Nine Heavens.

“Kill! Everyone!!”

This angry voice was filled with bloody killing power. With a single thought from a Saint, the body and mind and qi combined into one and turned into substance. It spread in all directions, and everyone who heard it went crazy.

Even the trial officers at the Cutting Path Stage, the higher void trial officers as well as the red and white-clothed people lost control instantly. They were controlled by the killing intent, and they brandished their sabers to slaughter the people around them. It was only when the ear-piercing sounds of weapons rang out that they came to their senses.

It was even more unbearable for those trial-takers at the Innate and Master

Stage.

When the weak heard the sound, blood spurted from their seven orifices and they fell to the ground.

When the experts lost their intelligence, they could still move but they would have a cultivation deviation.

A white-robed figure with a Saint halo appeared in the sky of the Four Symbols Secret Realm in the nick of time. With a wave of his hand, he produced a light shield that covered all the trial-takers.

The influence of this bloody killing intent was barely broken.

However, the treatment of the wounded and the subsequent treatment of their mental state after being affected by the Holy Power ran into problems.

Wei An was really angry.

But now, he did not dare to leave the Four Symbols Secret Realm for even a moment. He was afraid that if he left to find Dao Qiongcang, something would happen here again.

This was clearly the killing intent of Wei Feng, the God of Killing!

This time, if Dao Qiongcang did not give him an explanation, he would not be able to justify himself!

However…

“How could it happen so suddenly?”

Demi-saints could not use all of their Fire Power on the Shengshen Continent. This rule was set by the Holy Divine Palace.

If it was not allowed on the Shengshen Continent, it naturally would not be allowed in the extradimensional space too. The three emperors had to act with restraint when they did things.

“Even the ‘killing intent’ had appeared…”

“The next step wouldn’t be the God of Killing domain, right? Who provoked this lunatic?”

Sacred Mountain Gui Zhe.

“Array Eye No. 36, Zhou Rang, is in position. We have been attacked by Holy Power. This power…”

“Array Eye No.122, Zhao Cheng is in position. My area was also affected, but I quickly got rid of the killing intent…”

“Array Eye No.3, Cheng Huan is in position. Did, did Wei Feng make a move? Do we need to retreat?”

“Ran Ming ruins, Beibei is in position. Hallmaster Dao, I’m stuck in the middle of the Black Water Stream. What should I do next?”

In an instant, countless messages came from the Heavenly Group’s combat channel.

Dao Qiongcang, who was at the Diaoyu Isle smiled and moved his finger.

Everyone who transmitted a report received a response and calmed down. They knew that with the Hallmaster around, things would not be chaotic.

“Ran Ming ruins, Beibei is in position. Hallmaster Dao, I’m too close. Senior Wei Feng seemed to have gone crazy…” Beibei was anxious.

“What? What? I am Yue Gongli. I am outside the Four Symbols Secret Realm.  Little girl, why are you stuck in the Black Water Stream? Tell me the details. I am very bored now.”

“Ran Ming ruins, Beibei is in position. Senior Yue Gongli, I heard…” “What did you hear?” Dao Qiongcang’s voice suddenly interrupted.

“Uh, Beibei didn’t hear anything.” Beibei suddenly realized that Senior Wei Feng could also hear her through the channel.

“Then just wait, get closer, but don’t be discovered by the God of Killing domain. Observe and learn well.” God of Killing domain?

He hadn’t seen this thing yet.

So Senior Wei Feng would definitely make a move?

Had everything been planned by Hallmaster Dao in advance?

“Alright…” Beibei replied in surprise.

“Dao Qiongcang, are you crazy? I’m so bored now. Why don’t you let her talk about it…” Yue Gongli’s voice suddenly disappeared from the Heavenly Group’s battle channel.

After Dao Qiongcang replied to all, his eyes shifted and he sneered.

He looked at Ai Cangsheng and quickly turned his head back. However, he took another look and then turned around again. His movements were very slight.

His fingers fiddled with the star dipper on the divine Sinan. His fingertips moved faster than usual and more subconsciously.

“Speak.”

Ai Cangsheng did not even turn his head, but the Eyes of the Great Path saw all of this.

Everyone was eager to share, and Dao Qiongcang was no exception.

His actions clearly showed that he had discovered some shocking secret. Even with his temperament, he couldn’t suppress it and wanted to share it.

When he thought about it, it must be related to the sudden killing intent that broke out on Gong Yang Mountain.

“Your eyes are really sharp.” Dao Qiongcang laughed.

“I’m not sharp-eyed, I’m just not blind.”

“Alright, I won’t hide it from you. I discovered something terrifying.”

“What is it?”

“See this?” Dao Qiongcang dipped his cup into the water and dripped it onto the table.

Ai Cangsheng tilted his head and looked over. It was just a drop of water. It was transparent, pure, and ordinary. There was nothing special about it.

“Yu Lingdi joined the Saint Servant?” Ai Cangsheng looked up in shock.

“Uhh.” Dao Qiongcang’s expression froze as he muttered silently, “You’re really bold and unrestrained…”

“What’s that?”

“This is water. Can’t you tell?”

Ai Cangsheng was silent.

Dao Qiongcang flicked his finger, and a Divine Array shot out. The water flow on the table began to accelerate.

Soon, it naturally evaporated and disappeared.

“What about now?” Dao Qiongcang asked with interest, his eyes filled with excitement. “What did you see?”

Ai Cangsheng remained silent.

“It’s gone!” Dao Qiongcang did not need to answer. He slapped his thigh and stood up excitedly, his usual solemn demeanor gone.

“It’s gone!”

“It’s actually gone!”

“It had disappeared from this world, but it still exists in essence… My

Cangsheng great emperor, do you know how it disappeared?”

Ai Cangsheng spoke out. After he held it in for a long time, he finally managed to say, “Don’t delve too deeply into the Divine Secret. Be careful that one day, before Wei Feng goes crazy, you will go crazy first.”

Dao Qiongcang sat back down calmly.

He was indeed a person who wanted to share, but his desire to share was very restrained.

“Ai Cangsheng, are you really not curious?”

“Speak.” Ai Cangsheng wasn’t curious at first, but now he really wanted to know why a drop of water could make Dao Qiongcang lose his composure.

Water, if it wasn’t Yu Lingdi…

Yu MO was actually a double agent?

Or could it be that Yu Mo’s father had already risen from his coffin?

Dao Qiongcang looked up and leaned back lazily in his chair. He glanced at Ai Cangsheng and said.

“The Divine cannot be revealed..”
